title: (x) Little Monsters kids' shampoo packaging designed by Turner Duckworth - hand drawn {Jan E}
content:
This is from kids’ shampoo packaging designed by Turner Duckworth... does anyone know if it’s a font or hand-done?

Thanks...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203162513im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Little_Monsters_4353.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Glebe logo - Perpetua, similar to Baskerville {Jan E, Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203162513/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38410 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) HCSU logo wide squarish sans - several similar {gang} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203162513/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38384 "Go to next forum topic")
author: BrooklynRob

comments.content:
If I just look at the A’s - they are all different.

Handdrawn.

Reminiscent of [FF Liant](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203162513/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_liant_bold/) and [fonts inspired by Saul Bass](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203162513/http:/typographica.org/001110.php) (see list at bottom of post).
